price: 7. Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nummaysa, kaadu acuya amol sin kak hee maalu (ciggiile mara sin kak abe maalu). Siinik Yalla nummayseeh isi maalu Yallih sabbatah yecee marii, kaxxa galto- le.
arabic: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُواْ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
